title: The nearly impossible job of managing MrBeast: An interview with Reed Duchscher [Extended}
description: Today on the Colin and Samir Show, we're interviewing Reed Duchscher, MrBeast's Manager and the CEO of Night Media. We sat down with Reed to talk about how he became a manager, meeting MrBeast, and the hardest part of working with creators.
